title: The Mecha Project
teaser: Kronas' engineering skillsets have brought him where he is today: a leading engineer in Vortec Corp. But can he control his creation, or will it control him instead?
summary: While working in his research lab, Kronas' creation, a feral dragon mecha comes to life without his knowledge. It pulls Kronas into it, plugging him with an anal plug and encasing his cock in a sleeve. The head scientist finds him the next day and, not knowing that Kronas is inside the suit, turns the mecha off.
